QuestData.Title: No Wisp Left Behind
QuestData.Description:
More of the Kaldorei souls still languish in the Maw.
I ask you once again, Maw Walker, to find them.
Help correct this wrong.
QuestData.LogDescription: Travel to the Maw and rescue Lost Souls from the Tremaculum and the Planes of Torment.
QuestData.RewardText:
It brings me joy to see more souls freed from that dark place.
Thank you Maw Walker, for continuing to help us.
